foreignData.name: Taborax, Tod der Hoffnung
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Taborax, Tod der Hoffnung, hat Lebensverknüpfung, solange fünf oder mehr +1/+1-Marken auf ihm liegen.
Immer wenn eine andere Nichtspielsteinkreatur, die du kontrollierst, stirbt, lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf Taborax. Falls die Kreatur ein Kleriker war, kannst du eine Karte ziehen. Falls du dies tust, verlierst du 1 Lebenspunkt.

foreignData.name: Taborax, el Fin de la Esperanza
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Taborax, el Fin de la Esperanza tiene la habilidad de vínculo vital mientras tenga cinco o más contadores +1/+1 sobre él.
Siempre que otra criatura que no sea ficha que controlas muera, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre Taborax. Si esa criatura era un Clérigo, puedes robar una carta. Si lo haces, pierdes 1 vida.

foreignData.name: Taborax, tueur de l'espoir
foreignData.text:
Vol
Taborax, tueur de l'espoir a le lien de vie tant qu'il a au moins cinq marqueurs +1/+1 sur lui.
À chaque fois qu'une autre créature non-jeton que vous contrôlez meurt, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur Taborax. Si cette créature était un clerc, vous pouvez piocher une carte. Si vous faites ainsi, vous perdez 1 point de vie.

foreignData.name: Taborax, Morte della Speranza
foreignData.text:
Volare
Taborax, Morte della Speranza ha legame vitale fintanto che ha cinque o più segnalini +1/+1.
Ogniqualvolta un'altra creatura non pedina che controlli muore, metti un segnalino +1/+1 su Taborax. Se quella creatura era un Chierico, puoi pescare una carta. Se lo fai, perdi 1 punto vita.

foreignData.name: 希望の死、タボラックス
foreignData.text:
飛行
希望の死、タボラックスの上に５個以上の＋１/＋１カウンターがあるかぎり、これは絆魂を持つ。
あなたがコントロールしていてトークンでもこれでもないクリーチャー１体が死亡するたび、これの上に＋１/＋１カウンター１個を置く。そのクリーチャーがクレリックだったなら、カード１枚を引いてもよい。そうしたなら、あなたは１点のライフを失う。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — デーモン・クレリック

mainBoard.name: Taborax, Hope's Demise
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Taborax, Hope's Demise has lifelink as long as it has five or more +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Taborax. If that creature was a Cleric, you may draw a card. If you do, you lose 1 life.

rulings.text: If Taborax is dealt lethal damage at the same time as one or more nontoken creatures you control die or are dealt lethal damage, it won't receive a counter from its ability in time to save it.
If another nontoken Cleric dies at the same time as Taborax, you won't put a +1/+1 counter on anything, but you may draw a card as its last ability resolves. You still lose 1 life if you do.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
Taborax has lifelink as long as it has five or more +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Taborax. If that creature was a Cleric, you may draw a card. If you do, you lose 1 life.

foreignData.name: Nullpriesterin des Vergessens
foreignData.text:
Bonus {3}{B} (Du kannst zusätzlich {3}{B} bezahlen, sowie du diesen Zauberspruch wirkst.)
Lebensverknüpfung
Bedrohlich (Diese Kreatur kann nicht geblockt werden, außer von zwei oder mehr Kreaturen.)
Wenn die Nullpriesterin des Vergessens ins Spiel kommt und falls ihre Bonuskosten bezahlt wurden, bringe eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück.

foreignData.name: Sacerdotisa de nulos del olvido
foreignData.text:
Estímulo {3}{B}. (Puedes pagar {3}{B} adicionales al lanzar este hechizo.)
Vínculo vital.
Amenaza. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por dos o más criaturas.)
Cuando la Sacerdotisa de nulos del olvido entre, si fue estimulada, regresa la carta de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio al campo de batalla.

foreignData.name: Prêtresse des inféconds de l'oubli
foreignData.text:
Kick {3}{B} (Vous pouvez payer {3}{B} supplémentaires au moment où vous lancez ce sort.)
Lien de vie
Menace (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par deux créatures ou plus.)
Quand la Prêtresse des inféconds de l'oubli arrive, si elle a été kickée, renvoyez sur le champ de bataille une carte de créature ciblée depuis votre cimetière.

foreignData.name: Sacerdotessa dei Nulli dell'Oblio
foreignData.text:
Potenziamento {3}{B} (Puoi pagare {3}{B} addizionale mentre lanci questa magia.)
Legame vitale
Minacciare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da due o più creature.)
Quando la Sacerdotessa dei Nulli dell'Oblio entra, se è stata potenziata, rimetti sul campo di battaglia una carta creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.

foreignData.name: 忘却の虚僧
foreignData.text:
キッカー{3}{B}（この呪文を唱えるに際し、追加で{3}{B}を支払ってもよい。）
絆魂
威迫（このクリーチャーは２体以上のクリーチャーにしかブロックされない。）
忘却の虚僧が戦場に出たとき、これがキッカーされていた場合、あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とする。それを戦場に戻す。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 吸血鬼・クレリック

mainBoard.name: Nullpriest of Oblivion
mainBoard.originalText:
Kicker {3}{B} (You may pay an additional {3}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Lifelink
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Nullpriest of Oblivion enters, if it was kicked, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

rulings.text: If a card or token enters as a copy of a permanent, the new permanent isn't kicked, even if the original was.
If a spell's kicker cost was paid, the spell is "kicked."
If you copy a kicked spell on the stack, the copy is also kicked. If the copied spell is a permanent spell, the token the copy of that spell becomes when it enters is also kicked.
If you put a permanent with a kicker ability onto the battlefield without casting it, you can't kick it.
The kicker ability doesn't let you pay a kicker cost more than once.

To determine a spell's total cost, start with the mana cost (or an alternative cost if another card's effect allows you to pay one instead), add any cost increases (such as kicker), then apply any cost reductions. The spell's mana value remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

mainBoard.text:

Lifelink
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a creature card with mana value 3 or less.

Lebensverknüpfung (Schaden, der von dieser Kreatur zugefügt wird, lässt dich entsprechend viele Lebenspunkte dazuerhalten.)

mainBoard.name: Scion of the Swarm
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Scion of the Swarm.

rulings.text: An ability that triggers "whenever you gain life" triggers just once for each life-gaining event, no matter how much life you gain.

Each creature with lifelink dealing combat damage causes a separate life-gaining event. For example, if two creatures you control with lifelink deal combat damage at the same time, Scion of hte Swarm's ability will trigger twice. However, if a single creature you control with lifelink deals combat damage to multiple creatures, players, planeswalkers, and/or battles at the same time (perhaps because it has trample or was blocked by more than one creature), the ability will trigger only once.

Each creature with lifelink dealing combat damage causes a separate life-gaining event. For example, if two creatures you control with lifelink deal combat damage at the same time, a "whenever you gain life" ability will trigger twice. However, if a single creature you control with lifelink deals combat damage to multiple creatures, players, and/or planeswalkers at the same time (perhaps because it has trample or was blocked by more than one creature), the ability will trigger only once.
If Scion of the Swarm is dealt lethal damage at the same time that you gain life, it won't receive a counter from its ability in time to save it.
If you gain an amount of life "for each" of something or "equal to the number" of something, that life is gained as one event and Scion of the Swarm's ability triggers only once.
If you gain an amount of life "for each" of something, that life is gained as one event and the ability will trigger only once.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, life gained by your teammate won't cause Scion of the Swarm's ability to trigger, even though it caused your team's life total to increase.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, life gained by your teammate won't cause the ability to trigger, even though it caused your team's life total to increase.
The last ability of Scion of the Swarm triggers just once for each life-gaining event, whether it's 1 life from Dazzling Angel or 4 life from Apothecary Stomper.

mainBoard.name: Skemfar Shadowsage
mainBoard.originalText:
When Skemfar Shadowsage enters, choose one —
• Each opponent loses X life, where X is the greatest number of creatures you control that have a creature type in common.
• You gain X life, where X is the greatest number of creatures you control that have a creature type in common.

rulings.text: The amount of life lost or gained is calculated as the triggered ability resolves based on the creatures you control at that time, including Skemfar Shadowsage itself if it's still under your control. You'll always use the greatest number possible. You don't need to choose any creature types. For example, if you control a Giant Wizard, a Giant Warrior, an Elf Warrior, and a Kor Warrior at that time, each opponent will lose 3 life or you'll gain 3 life.
You choose which mode the triggered ability has as you put that ability on the stack. You can't change modes later.
